comment.author: 33516481@N05
comment._content: Note the rudimentary guard above the donkey boiler, the beginnings of H&S at work, it would stop hot rivets and metal chips hitting the engineer-not that it stop a 12ton peice of steel crashing onto the person below!

comment.author: 41675580@N08
comment._content: These old pictures are from the time when Britain was entitled to have the word 'Great' before the name, at least as far as shipbuilding went.
